text:
Proclamation under the Food Act 2003

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Food Act 2003 fix 15 October 2003 as the day on which that Act commences.

29 September 2003

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Health and Human Services

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 October 2003

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
